column1: #Text=Licences (and milk quotas, etc.) should never have been allowed to be sold on a secondary market.
#Text=We need a solution but it likely will fall short of full compensation for the capital cost of plates that lead to high fares.
#Text=Perhaps a transfer of fees from plate less drivers to plate owners for a limited number of years.
#Text=Perhaps whatever courts rule when the certain lawsuits are settled.
